questions: Q. 1. What is meant by ‘Political Party’?
answers: Ans. A political po litical party is a group of people come together to contest elections to hold power in the government.

questions: Q. 2. What is an important function of a political party in India ?
Q. 3. Who take direct part in the elections ?
Q. 4. Which is not a component of a political party ?
Q. 5. What is a ruling party party ?
answers: Ans. Political party that runs the government.
